history.proof: intros H1 H2. unfold valid in H1. unfold getProtocol. symmetry. shelve.

exceptions.tactic: intros W U l H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of findUnL (find _ (_ \\+ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of H2 (l \\in dom U.1) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment U, W : world l : Label H1 : PCM.valid_op (PCM.class (prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type))) (U \\+ W) H2 : l \\in dom U.1 Unable to unify "is_true (PCM.valid_op (PCM.class (prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type))) (U \\+ W))" with "match find l (U \\+ W) with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt l end = match find l U with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt l end".

In environment U, W : world l : Label H1 : PCM.valid_op (PCM.class (prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type))) (U \\+ W) H2 : l \\in dom U.1 Unable to unify "is_true (l \\in dom U.1)" with "match find l (U \\+ W) with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt l end = match find l U with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt l end".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
W: world
U: world
l: Equality.sort Label

Goal:
valid (U \+ W) -> l \in dom U.1 -> getProtocol U l = getProtocol (U \+ W) l

Premises:
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
Notation valid := @PCM.valid
dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K
getProtocol = fun (w : world) (i : Label) => match find i w with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt i end : world -> Label -> protocol
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
cohUnKL : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s' \In Coh W -> hook_complete U -> s \In Coh U
cohUnKR : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s \In Coh U -> hook_complete W -> s' \In Coh W
Actions.tryrecv_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> Actions.action W (option (nid * nat * seq nat)) this
tryrecv_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> Actions.action W (option (nid * nat * seq nat)) this
getsE : forall (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> find l s = Some (getStatelet s l)
Actions.safe_local : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall s : state, Actions.skip_safe W s -> coh p (getStatelet s l)
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s1 -> forall (s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s1 s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
joinxK : forall (U : cpcm) (x x1 x2 : U), valid (x \+ x1) -> x \+ x1 = x \+ x2 -> x1 = x2
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
send_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label), getProtocol W l = p -> forall st : send_trans (coh p), st \In snd_trans p -> seq nat -> nid -> Actions.action W (seq nat) this
Actions.send_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label), getProtocol W l = p -> forall st : send_trans (coh p), st \In snd_trans p -> seq nat -> nid -> Actions.action W (seq nat) this
skip_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> Actions.action W V this
Actions.skip_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> Actions.action W V this
findUnL : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f1 f2 : U), valid (f1 \+ f2) -> find k (f1 \+ f2) = (if k \in dom f1 then find k f1 else find k f2)
Actions.skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
domUn : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U), dom (f1 \+ f2) =i [pred x | valid (f1 \+ f2) & (x \in dom f1) || (x \in dom f2)]
sem_extend : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), injects U V K -> forall (s1 s2 s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> s2 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)
validL : forall (U : pcm) (x y : U), valid (x \+ y) -> valid x
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) -> (forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) -> (forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> P) ->...-> P
Actions.send_act_step_sem : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label), getProtocol W l = p -> forall st : send_trans (coh p), st \In snd_trans p -> forall (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s1 : state) (S : Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s1) (s2 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (r : seq nat), Actions.send_act_step S s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
cohK : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K), V = U \+ inj_ext w \+ (Unit, K)
Record injects (U V : world) (K : hooks) : Type := Inject { E : world; _ : hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E; _ : V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K); _ : hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K; _ : forall s : state, Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2]); _ : forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 ->...-> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step E this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2 } Arguments Injection.Inject [U V K E] _ _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
umfilt_dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U), valid (f1 \+ f2) -> um_filter (mem (dom f1)) (f1 \+ f2) = f1
pcmPE : forall U V : pcm, (forall (x1 y1 : U) (x2 y2 : V), (x1, x2) \+ (y1, y2) = (x1 \+ y1, x2 \+ y2)) * (forall x : prodPCM U V, valid x = valid x.1 && valid x.2)
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
Coh_dom : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s l)) =i nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt -> [/\ find i (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) = Some {| content := msg0; from := from; to := this; active := true |}, msg_wf rt (coh_s l C) this from msg0 & let loc' := receive_step rt from msg0 (coh_s l C) pf in s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this loc' (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) i |} s1] -> network_step w this s1 s2
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
sem_split : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \In Coh U -> s2 \In Coh U -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step (inj_ext w) this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2
step_preserves_node_ids : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (l : Label), l \in dom s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2 -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) =i dom (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
valid_true : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U), valid f1 -> valid f2 -> (forall x : K, x \in dom f1 -> x \notin dom f2) -> validUn_spec f1 f2 true
um_eta : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U), k \in dom f -> exists v : V, find k f = Some v /\ f = pts k v \+ free k f
Actions.skip_step_total : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol) (pf : getProtocol W l = p) (V : Type) (f : forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) (s : state) (S : Actions.skip_safe W s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), Actions.skip_step pf f S s' r
Actions.skip_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol) (pf : getProtocol W l = p) (V : Type) (f : forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) (s1 : state) (S : Actions.skip_safe W s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.skip_step pf f S s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
CohUn : forall (w1 w2 : world) (s1 s2 : state), Coh w1 s1 -> Coh w2 s2 -> valid (w1 \+ w2) -> Coh (w1 \+ w2) (s1 \+ s2)
injExtL' : forall (W1 W2 : world) (K : hooks) (pf : injects W1 (W1 \+ W2) K), valid (W1 \+ W2) -> inj_ext pf \+ (Unit, K) = W2
joinA : forall (U : pcm) (x y z : U), x \+ (y \+ z) = x \+ y \+ z

``` 
intros W U l H1 H2.
unfold valid in H1.
unfold getProtocol.
rewrite findUnL in H2.
- rewrite H2 in H1. symmetry. apply H1.
- apply H2.
```

original: intros W U l H1 H2. unfold valid in H1. unfold getProtocol. rewrite findUnL in H2. - rewrite H2 in H1. symmetry. apply H1. - apply H2.
